channel.title: Comments on: YAPWF! Brand new! Or is it?

item.title: by: Geoff Wilson
item.description:
The video on the TurboGears site is very pretty, even if you can hear the pages turn. I like the way that it doesn't use anything (much) new, but is composed of existing libraries. Unix'y in feel.

And I've been looking for an excuse to play with MochiKit. :)
item.content:encoded:
The video on the TurboGears site is very pretty, even if you can hear the pages turn. I like the way that it doesn’t use anything (much) new, but is composed of existing libraries. Unix’y in feel.

And I’ve been looking for an excuse to play with MochiKit. :)

item.title: by: Bill de h√ìra
item.description: Man, I see this kind of stuf and it makes me think the Python web frameworks world needs Total War. No nice guy stuff - winner takes all.
item.content:encoded: Man, I see this kind of stuf and it makes me think the Python web frameworks world needs Total War. No nice guy stuff - winner takes all.
